name: Sergey Sivtsov
title: .NET Software Engineer
summary: .NET developer with 6+ years of enterprise web application development. Experienced in cutting-edge technologies such as ASP.NET Core, React, gRPC.
skillsSummary: Strong technical knowledge in design and implementation of enterprise applications based on .NET Framework
Good knowledge of modern development techniques, patterns and trends
Experienced in working with Agile (Scrum) methodology
Experienced in working with Azure DevOps Server, configuring builds/deployments

projects.projectName: A Groundbreaking AdTech Automation Platform for the TV Space
projects.projectOverview: An innovative ad tech platform encompassing data-driven, automated solutions and services designed to greatly facilitate the buying and selling of advertising in the TV space. The system acts as a unified, end-to-end TV ad marketplace aiming to bring together advertisers, buyers, and TV stations across the United States. The platform offers real-time information on avails, seamless integration with Mediaocean and Strata, transparent order placement, validation, and management, and sophisticated reporting for 100% process transparency.
responsibilities: Estimating tasks
Implementation of business logic on backend as well as frontend using cutting-edge technologies
Developing of gRPC services
Code review and refactoring, bug fixing
Writing unit and automated tests
Creating builds, setting up environments, configuring deployments
Integration with OKTA (single sign-on solution)
Communication with a customer on a daily basis

projects.projectOverview: Concierge is a special service to assist customers with all aspect of Worker Compensation claim. The application gives ability to create new requests with different medical service, search/filtering requests. The main page of application has many dynamic forms that loaded depending on the user actions. This functionality works on AJAX callbacks.
responsibilities: Estimating tasks
Implementing of business logic of system components
Creating dynamic panels
Implementing of validation
Implementing of Direct Read/Write beetween partner systems
Developing  of modules to integrate application with other services

projects.projectOverview: The purpose of the project is to help with processing emails and faxes like Outlook.
responsibilities: Estimating tasks, creating project plans
Implementing of business requirements
Developing optimized counting functionality for folders with records
Implementing of new email/reply/forward actions
Creating LDAP address book, IMAP collector
Adding support of embedded attachments to records
Developing of ownership functionality
Developing of plugins to integrate with other applications

Implementing backup mechanism to restore unsuccessfully uploaded records to the database based on Oracle Advanced Queuing. The database used to trigger different instances of services running under the load balancer to restore backuped records from the file system.

projects.title: .NET Software Engineer
projects.projectOverview: ECH Agent is an application that serves for interception of incoming calls through Avaya Softphone, retrieving the UUI from a phone call and provide more detailed information about the caller to other internal applications.
responsibilities: Implementing the part responsible for intercepting calls
Creating plugins for integration with internal applications
